tokens.resolved_gloss: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
tokens.translation: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to turn aside (especially for lodging); hence to be a foreigner, strange, profane; specifically (active participle) to commit adultery
tokens.translation: to turn aside (especially for lodging); hence to be a foreigner, strange, profane; specifically (active participle) to commit adultery

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
